markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Precious Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1964) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1960)

</column>

---

You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses. Choose [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) or [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379); if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) to the list of materials you can choose from.
name: Precious Arrow
